sourcesContent:
Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airLine}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure.place}}
{{flight.departure.time | date}}
{{flight.departure.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival.place}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchResults: FlightRm[] = [ { airLine: "American Airlines", arrival: { time: new Date().toString(), place: "Istanbul" }, departure: { time: new Date().toString(), place: "Los Angeles" }, price: "350", remainingNumberOfSeats: 500 }, { airLine: "Deutsche BA", arrival: { time: new Date().toString(), place: "Munchen" }, departure: { time: new Date().toString(), place: "Schipol" }, price: "600", remainingNumberOfSeats: 60 } ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } } export interface FlightRm { airLine: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
